description: Clad in well-worn leather armor, this wretch is still alive and breathing despite its unsteady gait and bloodshot gaze.  Gripped by raving madness, they clutch a blood-stained dagger in one grimy hand.

name: bloodwalker
description: A large, humanoid being seemingly made of animated blood.  Two slightly darker patches serve as its eyes.  Its hands end in long claws, which flex as it walks.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s snaps a tentacle of flowing blood at your %2$s!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s snaps a tentacle tentacle of flowing blood at <npcname>!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's blood tentacle lashes out at you without doing any damage.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's blood tentacle lashes out at <npcname> without doing any damage.
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s's blood tentacle snaps at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s's blood tentacle snaps at <npcname>, but they dodge!

special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s claws at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to claw at <npcname>, but they dodge!
